full_text: Blsipab ae cea Baar IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2020/KERIIT PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. SRI.N.V.VINAY RESPONDENT/S: 1 STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALAM ERNAKULAM - 682 031. 2 ABAY VINOD S/O. VINOD, CHOORUKUZHINMEL HOUSE, KAYAKKODY P.O., CALICUT DISTRICT - 673 508. 3 SHIBIN DAS S/O. DEVDAS, KUTTIKUNNUMAL HOUSE, MOYILOTHARA P.O., MARUTOMKARA, CALICUT DISTRICT. IRAE) ae cea Bl Crl.MC.No.7179 OF 2019 (F) 2 2020/KERIST 4 VIPIN S/O. VINAYAN, KAVILUMPARA (VIA), KUNDATHODU P.O., CALICUT DISTRICT - 673 508. R2-4 BY ADV. SUNIL.M.KARANY OTHER PRESENT: C.S.HRITHWIK-SR.PP THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 06.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Bier Crl.MC.No.7179 OF 2019 (F) 3 2020/KERIST ORDER Dated this the 6th day of January 2020 Petitioners are accused in Crime No.30/2018 _ of Thottilpalam Police Station for having allegedly committed offences punishable under Sections 323 and 324 r/w Section 34 IPC. 2. The de facto complainant are respondents 2,3 and 4. The case against petitioners 1 to 3 was taken on file of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-I, Nadapuram as C.C. No.672/2018 and the case against the 4" petitioner, who was then a Juvenile, is pending before the Juvenile Justice Board, Kozhikode as S.T. No. 104/2018. 3.The de facto complainant and injured have appeared through counsel and filed affidavits to the effect that the matter has been amicably settled with the petitioners and that they do not have any grievance against them. A report has been called for from the investigating officer through the Senior Public Prosecutor. Petitioners do not have criminal antecedents. They were all students at the time of alleged offence. No public interest is involved. Bel Crl.MC.No.7179 OF 2019 (F) 4 2020/KERIST In the result, the Crl.M.C. is allowed and the entire proceedings in Crime No.30/2018 of Thottilpalam Police Station presently pending against petitioners 1 to 3 as CC No.672/2018 before the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-I, Nadapuram and against the 4" petitioner as ST No.104/2018 before the Juvenile Justice Board, Kozhikode stands quashed under Section 482 of CrP.C and the accused are discharged. SD/- ASHOK MENON rmm JUDGE eee ae cea Bl Crl.MC.No.7179 OF 2019 (F) 5 2020/KERIST APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE A-1 TRUE COPY OF THE F.I.R. NO. 672 OF 2018. ANNEXURE A-2 CERTIFIED COPY OF FINAL REPORT IN C.C. 672/2018 WHICH IS NOW PENDING BEFORE HON'BLE JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT-I, NADAPURAM. ANNEXURE A-3 CERTIFIED COPY OF FINAL REPORT IN ST NO.104/2018 WHICH IS NOW PENDING BEFORE HON'BLE JUVENILE JUSTICE BOARD KOZHIKODE. ANNEXURE A-4 TRUE COPY OF THE AFFIDAVIT SIGNED BY THE 2ND RESPONDENT DATED 10.10.2019. ANNEXURE A-5 TRUE COPY OF THE AFFIDAVIT SIGNED BY THE 3RD RESPONDENT DATED 10.10.2019. ANNEXURE A-6 TRUE COPY OF THE AFFIDAVIT SIGNED BY THE 4TH RESPONDENT DATED 10.10.2019.
